channel.title: Comments on: The Wedding Present in the studio with Steve Albini

item.title: By: samuelLsamson
item.dc:creator: samuelLsamson
item.description: The other reason there aren't more twp studio albums is that between 1998 and 2003 the singer/songwriter David Gedge released three studio albums and numerous singles and live recordings under the name 'Cinerama.'
item.content:encoded: The other reason there aren’t more twp studio albums is that between 1998 and 2003 the singer/songwriter David Gedge released three studio albums and numerous singles and live recordings under the name ‘Cinerama.’
